scripts.compile:ui: cd ui && npm install && rm -rf dist/ && npm run compile:prod && cp -rf dist/* ../static/ui/
scripts.compile:ui:only: cd ui && npm install  && rm -rf dist/ && npm run compile:prod
scripts.bundle: cd ui && rm -rf dist/ && npm run compile:prod && rm -rf ../static/ui/*.* && cd .. && cp -rf ui/dist/* static/ui/
scripts.dev: cd ui && npm run deploy:prod && cp -rf dist/* ../static/ && cd .. && python main.py
